scripts.build: cd ./potentialQA_SDK && npm run build && cd .. && cd ./server-side && npm i && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.init: cd ./potentialQA_SDK && npm install && cd .. && cd ./server-side && npm install && cd.. && npm install
scripts.client:singlespa: cd client-side && ng serve --port 4400 --configuration SingleSpa && cd..
scripts.client:standalone: cd client-side && ng serve --port 4400 --configuration Standalone && cd..
scripts.cpi-publish-addon: cd ./cpi-side && npm run build:debug && cd .. && cpi-node-debug
